level.text: All new Commissioners shall receive training in the various aspects of property valuation for all classes of property and orientation on the Commission’s rules and regulations.
Maintain the calendar for the Commission and each Panel of the Commission;
Maintain a separate hearing file for each appeal coming before the Commission. Each file shall include:
All correspondence pertinent to the appeal;
Documents filed in the appeal, including exhibits;
Notices of the Commission or Panel, including hearing notices; and
Written determinations and decisions of the Commission or Panel; and
Perform such other duties as the Chairperson may require.
